author: COMSOL
description: A spherical sand grain falls in a water tank. Released from stand-still, the grain accelerates and reaches a terminal velocity. This example simulates the fluid flow in a moving coordinate system coupled to an ODE that describes the force balance on the grain.
label: falling_sand.mph
name: root

settings.description: Velocity of the tangentially moving wall
settings.name: uvw

title: Terminal Falling Velocity of a Sand Grain
